touchid.touchSetupStep2: Tap Add a Fingerprint and hold your device as you normally would when touching the Home button
touchid.touchSetupStep3: Continue to lift and rest your finger slowly, making small adjustments to the position of your finger each time.

faceid.faceSetupStep4: You'll now be instructed to move your face around in a Circular motion for the camera and Sensors to capture
faceid.faceSetupStep5: As you do, the gray lines surrounding the circle will turn green as it captures your Facial characteristics.

moipayments.servicetype_058_1: The purpose of this service is to query about a specific associate fees by providing the following:
moipayments.servicetype_058_2: The head of household Alien ID (Iqama ID or Border Number).
moipayments.servicetype_058_3: The associate ID (Iqama ID or Border Number).
moipayments.servicetype_058_4: The Fees Duration End Date. The fees will be calculated up to the provided date.
moipayments.servicetype_058_5: In case a date is not provided, the fee will be calculated as the following:
moipayments.servicetype_058_6: If the supplied Head of Household ID (Alien ID) is an Iqama Number:
moipayments.servicetype_058_7: If the Head of Household Iqama has a validity of 180 days or more then the fees will be calculated up to the Iqama Expiry Date.
moipayments.servicetype_058_8: If the Head of Household Iqama has a validity of less than 180 days then multiplications of one year (360 days) will be added for the current Iqama Expiry Date until the validity of the Iqama reach 180 Days or more.
moipayments.servicetype_058_9: If the supplied Head of Household ID (Alien ID) is a Border Number:
moipayments.servicetype_058_10: The fees will be calculated for the most suitable duration (multiplications of 1 Year) which allows for issuing the Iqama with a validity of at least 180 Days.
moipayments.servicetype_059_1: The purpose of this service is to query about the fees for all registered associates on the Head of Household by providing the following:
moipayments.servicetype_059_2: The Head of Household Iqama ID.
moipayments.servicetype_059_3: The Fees Duration End Date. The fees will be calculated up until this provided date. In case a date is not provided, the following calculation will be done as per the following:
moipayments.servicetype_059_4: If the Head of Household Iqama has a validity of 180 days or more then the fees will be calculated up until the Iqama Expiry Date.
moipayments.servicetype_059_5: If the Head of Household Iqama has a validity of less than 180 days then multiplications of one year (360 days) will be added for the current Iqama Expiry Date until the validity of the Iqama reach 180 Days or more.
